WorkItem.Description:
I was wearing my cat set, used the Rawr addon to load my available gear, added available items from the Molten Front, and made the changes necessary to optimize for Bear.
 
After everything was done, I opened the optimizer and set it for Overall score, optimize food/flasks+mixology, max thoroughness. I ctrl-clicked the Optimize button.
 
Rawr pointed out two gems (Agile meta and a type of Demonseye) that I had in my equipped cat gear but are not in the Bear gem template. It asked if I wished to continue anyway, and I said OK. The next dialogue box popped up warning about too many options on certain slots, but I was unable to click it... and after a while the page reported that Silverlight had crashed.
 
This happened several times, while I tried to narrow the selection of items thinking that was the problem. Finally, I made available the two gems that were being flagged, and Rawr worked just fine.
WorkItem.Summary: Silverlight crashes when equipped gems are not available

Comments.Message: Can you post the character xml that results in crash? The error itself would also help.

There's not an error per se, but this is what I get.
----------------------
The following currently equipped items are not available

Agile Shadowspirit Diamond is not available
Glinting Demonseye is not available

Would you like to continue with the optimization?
(I click OK)
The following slots have a very large number of items selected:

Chest Items
Waist Items
Legs Items

Do you want to continue with the optimization?
(Can't click anything, it's locked up)
The Silverlight plugin has crashed.
(link) Send crash report

This is on Firefox.
Can you try another browser? I've tried IE and Chrome and both worked ok.
